VASSAL.chat.ui

Class RoomInteractionControlsInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.chat.ui.RoomInteractionControlsInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChatControlsInitializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LockableRoomControls

    public class RoomInteractionControlsInitializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChatControlsInitializer
    Adds mouse listeners to the RoomTree components: double-click to join a room, etc. Builds a popup when right-clicking on a player or room
